summary: This test suite validates the functionality of the MODFLOW 6 storage (STO) package integration within the imod library. It includes helper utilities to construct model arrays and a collection of unit tests that check input validation, deprecation handling, and the correct rendering of specific storage and storage coefficient specifications across various modeling scenarios.
business_intent: Ensure that the groundwater modeling software correctly processes storage parameters, raises appropriate errors for invalid configurations, and generates accurate MODFLOW 6 input files, thereby maintaining model reliability and compliance with hydrological standards.
